tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sex_offenders (
 offender_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 offender_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
 gender VARCHAR(10),
 age INT,
 address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE registered_offenders (
    offender_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    gender CHAR(1),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    address VARCHAR(100),
    crime_committed VARCHAR(100),
    registration_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE offender_addresses (
    address_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    offender_id UUID REFERENCES registered_offenders(offender_id),
    address_type VARCHAR(50),
    street_address VARCHAR(100),
    city VARCHAR(50),
    state CHAR(2),
    zip_code CHAR(5)
);
CREATE TABLE sex_offenders ( offender_id INT PRIMARY KEY, offender_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, offender_age INT NOT NULL, offender_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE offense_types ( offense_id INT PRIMARY KEY, offense_category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, offense_description TEXT NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE offender_victims ( victim_id INT PRIMARY KEY, victim_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, victim_relation VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, offender_id INT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (offender_id) REFERENCES sex_offenders(offender_id) );

CREATE TABLE offender_locations ( location_id INT PRIMARY KEY, location_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, location_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, offender_id INT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (offender_id) REFERENCES sex_offenders(offender_id) );

CREATE TABLE registered_sex_offenders (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  age INT,
  address VARCHAR(255),
  crime VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE offender_locations (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  offender_id INT,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE offender_aliases (
  alias_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  offender_id INT,
  alias_name VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE offender_photos (
  photo_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  offender_id INT,
  photo_url VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE offender_relations (
  relation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  offender_id_1 INT,
  offender_id_2 INT,
  relation_type VARCHAR(255)
)
